Kyrie Irving

Kyrie Andrew Irving ▪ Instagram: kyrieirving

(Uncle Drew, Ankletaker, World B. Flat, Kai)

Position: Point Guard and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-2, 195lb (188cm, 88kg)

Team: Dallas Mavericks

Born: March 23, 1992 in Melbourne, Australia au

Relatives: Cousin Isaiah Briscoe

College: Duke

High School: Saint Patrick in Elizabeth, New Jersey

Recruiting Rank: 2010 (2)

Draft: Cleveland Cavaliers, 1st round (1st pick, 1st overall), 2011 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: December 26, 2011

Experience: 13 years

  • 8x All Star
  • 2016 NBA Champ
  • 3x All-NBA
  • 2011-12 All-Rookie
  • 2011-12 ROY
  • 2013-14 AS MVP
